amendment.description: To increase by $5,000,000 the amount available for Economic Support Fund assistance for Lebanon, and to increase by $2,000,000 the amount of such assistance that should be made available for scholarships and direct support of American educational institutions in Lebanon.

action.text: Amendment SA 1298 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sununu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1298 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
